#include <bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    int a[2000005];
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    scanf ("%d", &t);
    while (t--)
    {
    int n;
    scanf ("%d", &n);
    int b[n+2];
    int hi = 0, temp;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
    {
    scanf ("%d", &b[i]);
    hi = max(hi, b[i]);
    }
    for(int i=0;i<=hi+2;i++)
    a[i]=0;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    a[b[i]]++;
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = hi; i > 1; --i)
    {
    int count = 0;
    for (int j = i; j <= hi; j = j + i)
    count += a[j];
    if (count > 1)
    {
    ans = i;
    break;
    }
    }
    if (ans)
    printf ("%d\n", ans);
    else
    printf ("1\n");
    }
    return 0;
    }
